Sample_1.Transcription: HE BEGAN A CONFUSED COMPLAINT AGAINST THE WIZARD WHO HAD VANISHED BEHIND THE CURTAIN ON THE LEFT
Sample_1.Origin: he began a confused complaint against the wizard who had vanished behind the curtain on the left
Sample_1.Inference: he began a confused complaint against the wizard who had vanished behind the curtain on the left

Sample_2.Transcription: ALSO A POPULAR CONTRIVANCE WHEREBY LOVE MAKING MAY BE SUSPENDED BUT NOT STOPPED DURING THE PICNIC SEASON
Sample_2.Origin: also a popular contrivance whereby lovemaking may be suspended but not stopped during the picnic season
Sample_2.Inference: also a popular contrivance whereby lovemaking may be suspended but not stopped during the picnic season

Sample_3.Transcription: HERE SHE WOULD STAY COMFORTED AND SOOTHED AMONG THE LOVELY PLANTS AND RICH EXOTICS REJOICING THE HEART OF OLD TURNER THE GARDENER WHO SINCE POLLY'S FIRST RAPTUROUS ENTRANCE HAD TAKEN HER INTO HIS GOOD GRACES FOR ALL TIME
Sample_3.Origin: here she would stay comforted and soothed among the lovely plants and rich exotics rejoicing the heart of old turner the gardener who since pollys first rapturous entrance had taken her into his good graces for all time
Sample_3.Inference: here she would stay comforted and soothed among the lovely plants and rich exotics rejoicing the heart of old turner the gardener who since pollys first rapturous entrance had taken her into his good graces for all time

Sample_5.Transcription: OUT IN THE WOODS STOOD A NICE LITTLE FIR TREE
Sample_5.Origin: out in the woods stood a nice little fir tree
Sample_5.Inference: out in the woods stood a nice little fir tree

Sample_1.Transcription: 两湖盆地是长江流域的心脏要地

Sample_1.Inference: 沐阳湖本地是长江流域的新长要地
